Class AuthenticationFilter

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.web.filter.GenericFilterBean
org.springframework.security.web.authentication.AbstractAuthenticationProcessingFilter
org.springframework.security.web.authentication.UsernamePasswordAuthenticationFilter
com.fitnessforge.security.filter.AuthenticationFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
jakarta.servlet.Filter, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanNameAware, org.springframework.beans.factory.DisposableBean, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, org.springframework.context.ApplicationEventPublisherAware, org.springframework.context.EnvironmentAware, org.springframework.context.MessageSourceAware, org.springframework.core.env.EnvironmentCapable, org.springframework.web.context.ServletContextAware
public class AuthenticationFilter extends org.springframework.security.web.authentication.UsernamePasswordAuthenticationFilter
Description:

Component of the Filter Chain of JWT (token based) authentication, which handles the authentication process of the user and token as well.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    org.springframework.security.core.Authentication
    attemptAuthentication(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
    This methods gets invocked when the filter is first time called.
    protected void
    successfulAuthentication(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, jakarta.servlet.FilterChain chain, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authResult)
    This methods gets invocked if the authentication is successfull and generates the JWT token using the JWTTokenGeneratorUtil class and the JWT token to the header under the Authorization tag.
    protected void
    unsuccessfulAuthentication(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, org.springframework.security.core.AuthenticationException failed)
    This methods gets invoked if the authentication was not successfull and generates an Status code of UNAUTHORIZED (401) with the error message received from the exception

    • attemptAuthentication

      public org.springframework.security.core.Authentication attemptAuthentication(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws org.springframework.security.core.AuthenticationException
      This methods gets invocked when the filter is first time called.
      Overrides:
      attemptAuthentication in class org.springframework.security.web.authentication.UsernamePasswordAuthenticationFilter
      Parameters:
      request - Contains the header and request information made on the api endpoint
      response - Contains the methods to write a response back to the user
      Returns:
      An Object of the MemberAuthenticationManager
      Throws:
      org.springframework.security.core.AuthenticationException

    • successfulAuthentication

      protected void successfulAuthentication(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, jakarta.servlet.FilterChain chain, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authResult) throws IOException, jakarta.servlet.ServletException
      This methods gets invocked if the authentication is successfull and generates the JWT token using the JWTTokenGeneratorUtil class and the JWT token to the header under the Authorization tag.
      Overrides:
      successfulAuthentication in class org.springframework.security.web.authentication.AbstractAuthenticationProcessingFilter
      Parameters:
      request - Contains the header and request information made on the api endpoint
      response - Contains the methods to write a response back to the user
      Throws:
      IOException
      jakarta.servlet.ServletException

    • unsuccessfulAuthentication

      protected void unsuccessfulAuthentication(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, org.springframework.security.core.AuthenticationException failed) throws IOException, jakarta.servlet.ServletException
      This methods gets invoked if the authentication was not successfull and generates an Status code of UNAUTHORIZED (401) with the error message received from the exception
      Overrides:
      unsuccessfulAuthentication in class org.springframework.security.web.authentication.AbstractAuthenticationProcessingFilter
      Parameters:
      request - Contains the header and request information made on the api endpoint
      response - Contains the methods to write a response back to the user
      failed - Contains the methods to get the exception message.
      Throws:
      IOException
